Package ru.introguzzle.parsers.common

package ru.introguzzle.parsers.common
This package contains common classes and utilities for parsing data. It includes submodules for JSON, XML, YAML, and other formats.

Main features: - Serialization and deserialization classes - Annotations such as ConstructorArgument or Excluded - This library configuration support - Cache that prevents OutOfMemoryError exceptions. Note: considering heavy relation on Reflection API and Invoke API, we may need to cache results of such heavy computations, thus it's really important component of this library - Field utilities - Converters between various data formats support - Throwing analogs of java.util function interfaces - Method injection classes - IO utilities - Types that are considered as primitive support - And other various utilities

Since:
1.0
Author:
introguzzle
